body_html:
Recently got TensorFlow 1.0 and pulled recent copies of tutorial code and data.

Command line:
python translate.py --data_dir {DATA_DIR} --train_dir {TRAIN_DIR} --en_vocab_size=40000 --fr_vocab_size=40000

Old problem with getting mostly _UNK has resolved. However, perplexity is stuck around 9.5:
global step 846400 learning rate 0.0001 step-time 0.55 perplexity 9.49

Decode output bears some resemblance to French, but it's quite off:

Who is the president of the United States?
Le Conseil de l’Europe a adopté le rapport de M . _UNK .
The president will return on Thursday.
Le gouvernement du Canada a publié un rapport sur les questions .

body:
Recently got TensorFlow 1.0 and pulled recent copies of tutorial code and data. 

Command line:
python translate.py --data_dir {DATA_DIR} --train_dir {TRAIN_DIR} --en_vocab_size=40000 --fr_vocab_size=40000

Old problem with getting mostly _UNK has resolved. However, perplexity is stuck around 9.5:
global step 846400 learning rate 0.0001 step-time 0.55 perplexity 9.49

Decode output bears some resemblance to French, but it's quite off:
> Who is the president of the United States?
Le Conseil de l’Europe a adopté le rapport de M . _UNK .
> The president will return on Thursday.
Le gouvernement du Canada a publié un rapport sur les questions .
